Purpose\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The purpose of this policy is to set forth Walgreens requirements regarding the preparation and submission of claims for reimbursement of pharmacy products and health care services to ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations, including the U.S. Anti-Kickback Statute, U.S. False Claims Act, state-specific anti-kickback and false claims laws and regulations, and Medicare and state Medicaid program requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This policy applies to all Walgreens Team Members in the U.S., Puerto Rico, the Virgin Islands and all other U.S. territories as well as third-party contractors or agents performing services on behalf of Walgreens involving requirements described within this policy.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. individual who is authorized to prescribe, dispense, or administer Walgreens pharmacy or medical products, or who is in a position to influence the purchasing, prescribing, dispensing, or use of Walgreens pharmacy or medical products. This includes clinical and non-clinical individuals (e.g., surgeons, hospital administrators) who make or have influence on product-related decisions, as well as administrative and other personnel acting on behalf of, or as an agent or contractor of, the HCP, and all people who are part of the care team or are involved with the referral process (e.g., social workers, case managers referral coordinators). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nurse practitioners and physician assistants who work at a retail
